brief.brief: Determines whether the Approval Requirements of a Task should be re-calculated.
The recalculation process evaluates the Approval Requirements of this Phase.
If the condition is true, Service Manager adds the requirement to the task, if not there.
If the condition is false, Service Manager removes the requirement from the task, if there.

detail.detail: The recalculation process does not reset the Task's Approval Requirements and leaves the Approved Groups intact.
It does not remove any Groups that appear in the Task even if they are not an Approval Requirement of the Phase
